roleset.name: abnormal formation
roleset.note: MALFORMATION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-form.01. (from malformation.01-n)

example.name: malform-v
example.text: Great animal, wonder if there is something in their diet that is causing the antlers to malform like that?

example.name: malformation-n
example.text: A vein of Galen aneurysm is congenital malformation of blood vessels of the brain that occurs prior to birth.
example.arg: of blood vessels of the brain

example.name: malformed-j
example.text: How disappointing. I thought it was going to be a condition [in which]-1 the scrotum was malformed into the shape of a cello *-1.
example.arg: into the shape of a cello
